segments.text: Rachel ? This is John Emory speaking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve got some bad news . All the plans sent over to the McGrath Corporation have been rejected . We ’ re going to have to start from scratch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought they had already agreed to everything . That ’ s going to take weeks to rework .
segments.speaker: S2
